title: NPC_Flowey_00
body:
<< if $floweySpokenTo is 0 >> 
<< p Flowey >>
Howdy! I’m Flowey! Flowey the Flower!
...Is what I would say if I knew where I was.
I know you got something to do with this, brat. And as much as I want to take that SOUL of yours…
We both know the only way outta here is through you.
<< p reader >>
Rude, much?
<< p Flowey >> 
WOULD YOU RATHER BE STUCK HERE? … Great! Then let’s begin. 
<< battle 0.1 0.9 Flowey >> 
See that... huh? This... isn’t how battles work. Just what kind of a hellhole did you bring me to?! Whatever.
<< p EvilFlowey >>
In this world, it’s KILL OR BE KILLED. AND YOU BET I WON’T PASS UP A CHANCE OF BEING WHOLE AGAIN!!
<< p blueski >>
WAIT!!!!!!!
<< p Flowey >> 
...and who the hell are you?!
<< destroy 0 >>
Anyways, I'll meet up with you... two... up ahead.
<< die >>
<< else >>
Go ahead, kid.
Move along.
<< endif >>
<< set $floweySpokenTo to 1 >>

title: NPC_Flowey_05
body:
You could've been great...
...if you didn't run like a baby.

title: NPC_Flowey_04
body:
There's definitely room for improvement...
I'm sure you'll get the hang of it eventually!

title: NPC_Flowey_03
body:
Great job back there, by the way.
<< p EvilFlowey >> 
You'll go far with that kind of an attitude...

title: NPC_Flowey_06
body:
<< if $battleState is 0 >>
[[NPC_Flowey_03]]
<< elseif  $battleState is 1 >>
[[NPC_Flowey_04]]
<< else >>
[[NPC_Flowey_05]]
<< endif >>

title: NPC_Flowey_01
body:
<< p flowey >>
Go ahead. Move along. Nothing to see here, kid.
